scripts.dev: pnpm web:build && node scripts/prepare-updater-endpoints.cjs && tauri dev
scripts.build: pnpm web:build && node scripts/prepare-updater-endpoints.cjs && tauri build --bundles nsis,updater
scripts.logo:gen: node logo/snap-all.cjs && pnpm exec tauri icon logo/256.png && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='src-tauri/icons';['android','ios'].forEach(d=>{try{fs.rmSync(p+'/'+d,{recursive:true,force:true})}catch{}});fs.readdirSync(p).filter(f=>/^Square.*\.png$/.test(f)||f==='StoreLogo.png').forEach(f=>{try{fs.rmSync(p+'/'+f,{force:true})}catch{}})"
